articles.title: ‘People wouldn’t show my work – or even reply to me’: Veronica Ryan on her Turner prize triumph - The Guardian
articles.description: The oldest artist ever to win the Turner spent years feeling as if she was invisible. Now, her quiet, contemplative sculptures have finally been rewarded with the British art world’s biggest prize
